title: Ghosts’ Sam and Jay Argue, and We Don’t Like It — Plus, Did Sasappis Finally Lose His V-Card?
description: Mom and Dad are fighting. It’s not often that we see discord between Sam and Jay on Ghosts, but this Thursday’s episode reminds us that although they’re couple goals, Sam and Jay also have arguments just like any other married pair, much as we dislike it. title: 9-1-1 Eases Viewers Into a New Era Without Bobby — Did His Funeral Provide the Closure You Needed?
description: Years from now, when 9-1-1 has run its course, we’ll look back on the procedural as two eras: Before Bobby’s Death (BBD) and After (ABD). As of Thursday’s devastating hour, we’re officially in the latter. When the episode begins, two weeks have passed since Bobby died, which means the characters have had the exact same […]
author: Andy Swift
